trans-unit.source: Provides a base implementation for channel sinks that want to expose a dictionary interface to their properties.
trans-unit.target: 提供希望向其属性公开字典接口的信道接收器的基实现。

trans-unit.source: Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages that are flowing through the channel as well as the stream that is used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 信道接收器提供插件的点，它允许访问基础流经通道，以及传输机制用于将消息发送到的远程对象的流的消息。

trans-unit.source: Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is serialized and transported.
trans-unit.target: 信道接收器链中的通道接收器提供程序，链接在一起，并且所有通道消息在序列化和传输消息之前都流过此接收器链。

trans-unit.source: This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level.
trans-unit.target: 此类，使链接要求，并且在类级别继承要求。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>直接调用方或派生的类没有基础结构权限时，将引发。

trans-unit.source: For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[的继承需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。
用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties" />, you must implement the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Keys" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Item(System.Object)" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 继承自<see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties" />，则必须实现<see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Keys" />属性和<see cref="P:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.Item(System.Object)" />属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is serialized and transported.
trans-unit.target: 信道接收器链中的通道接收器提供程序的链接在一起并序列化和传输消息之前，所有在通道消息流经此接收器链。
用于操作基础结构代码。
